message:
The Thunderstore UpdateTM

To update, just press 'Yes' and it should open the installer! If it doesn't, download via the website or Discord.

This major update adds full Thunderstore integration, improved mod management, and various UI enhancements to make modding easier than ever.
changelog: Added full Thunderstore API integration for mods and updates
Implemented mod categories with emoji indicators
Enhanced dependency checking and version comparison
Improved mod testing and export capabilities
Added selection limits when batch installing mods
Various UI improvements and bug fixes
